data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Lavoué, Sébastien (2016): Petrocephalus leo, a new species of African electric fish (Osteoglossomorpha: Mormyridae) from the Oubangui River basin (Congo basin). Zootaxa 4121 (3): 319-330, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4121.3.6
